children.title: latency
children.description: The packets on the tenant virtual network experience a delay (the amount of delay is configurable, in milliseconds).

children.title: loss
children.description: The packets on the tenant virtual network are randomly lost (the probability of loss of each packet is configurable, in percentage).

children.title: corrupt
children.description: The packets on the tenant virtual network are randomly corrupted (the probability of corruption of each packet is configurable, in percentage).

children.title: duplicate
children.description: The packets on the tenant virtual network are randomly duplicated (the probability of duplicating a packet is configurable, in percentage).

children.title: bottleneck
children.description: The tenant virtual network becomes a bandwidth bottleneck (the bandwidth throttling is configurable, in kbit/seconds).

children.title: delete
children.description: The tenant virtual network is deleted, together with all resources attached to the network.

children.title: latency
children.description: The packets on the tenant virtual subnet experience a delay (the amount of delay is configurable, in milliseconds).

children.title: loss
children.description: The packets on the tenant virtual subnet are randomly lost (the probability of loss of each packet is configurable, in percentage).

children.title: corrupt
children.description: The packets on the tenant virtual subnet are randomly corrupted (the probability of corruption of each packet is configurable, in percentage).

children.title: duplicate
children.description: The packets on the tenant virtual subnet are randomly duplicated (the probability of duplicating a packet is configurable, in percentage).

children.title: latency
children.description: The packets that flow through the virtual router experience a delay (the amount of delay is configurable, in milliseconds).

children.title: loss
children.description: The packets that flow through the virtual router are randomly lost (the probability of loss of each packet is configurable, in percentage).

children.title: corrupt
children.description: The packets that flow through the virtual router are randomly corrupted (the probability of corruption of each packet is configurable, in percentage).

children.title: duplicate
children.description: The packets that flow through the virtual router are randomly duplicated (the probability of duplicating a packet is configurable, in percentage).

children.title: bottleneck
children.description: The tenant virtual router becomes a bandwidth bottleneck (the bandwidth throttling is configurable, in kbit/seconds).

children.title: delete
children.description: The tenant virtual router is deleted, together with all resources attached to the router.

children.title: loss
children.description: The packets that flow on the port are randomly lost (the probability of loss of each packet is configurable, in percentage).

children.title: duplicate
children.description: The packets that flow on the port are randomly duplicated (the probability of duplicating a packet is configurable, in percentage).

children.title: bottleneck
children.description: The tenant virtual port becomes a bandwidth bottleneck (the bandwidth throttling is configurable, in kbit/seconds).

children.title: delete
children.description: The tenant port is deleted.

children.title: latency

children.description: The physical node network interfaces becomes a bandwidth bottleneck (the bandwidth throttling is configurable, in kbit/seconds).

children.title: down
children.description: The physical node network interfaces becomes all down

children.title: reboot
children.description: The physical node is rebooted
